short_summary: Replace automatic gates at Iles-de-la-Madeleine airport.
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Transport Canada, is issuing this request for proposal for the replacement of automatic gates located in Iles-de-la-Madeleine airport, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### EF997-240073 - Replacement of Automatic Gates at the Iles-de-la-Madeleine Airport

**Reference:** WS4040584352-Doc4040630236
**Amendment:** 1
**Publication Date:** June 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 5, 2023, 14:00:00 Local Time
**Expected Contract Start Date:** Not Applicable
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Project Overview:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Transport Canada, invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for the replacement of automatic gates located at the Iles-de-la-Madeleine airport.

**Key Project Details:**
- **Work Category:** Installation of Parking Facility Equipment
- **Contracting Region:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Eligibility and Requirements:**
Applicants must be Canadian businesses registered and capable of undertaking the required work. Submissions must include proof of business registration and evidence of technical qualifications.

**Contracting Entity:**
Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**
Antoine Englead, Contact Person
englead.antoine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16487424?extsite=MTY0ODc0MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Submissions:**
Bidders are required to submit proposals, which must include relevant qualifications, experience, and pricing information. The selection process will determine the successful bidder based on the lowest price.

We removed unnecessary information and formatted the text using Markdown. We ensured that all key details are included and presented in a clear, concise, and professional format.
